text: The Sandman is a children's book written by Ralph Fletcher with drawings by Richard Cowdrey. It was first published in 2008 by Henry Holt and Company. == Plot summary == Tor is an man one inch tall who can not fall asleep no matter what he tries. He finds a dragon scale while walking in the woods. He learns that the powder made by grinding the scale help a person to sleep. He then travels sprinkling the sand into the eyes of children who are having trouble sleeping. == References == * * * == Outside websites == *Ralph Fletcher's website *Richard Cowdrey's website Category:American children's books Category:2008 books Category:Books by Ralph Fletcher
